item.description:
International Gay Surfers Day Celebration

Can't surf? Come learn! Don't wanna surf? Enjoy a day on the Cape with rad people. Not gay? Everyone loves allies and everyone is welcome!

Ceto Surf will be celebrating International Gay Surfers Day with a daytime SUP/Surf Meet Up and after party at the Beachcomber in Wellfleet, MA on Saturday, July 16th

GEAR AND MUSIC RESERVATIONS ARE DIY SO PLEASE PLAN AHEAD. SEE FACEBOOK LINK FOR LATEST UPDATES.

DETAILS BELOW & CHECK THE FACEBOOK INVITE HERE:
https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=144793798930633 

SURF/SUP MEET UP AT CAHOON BEACH IN WELLFLEET - 3PM
What: SUP/Surf Meet Up at Cahoon Hallow Beach
When: Saturday, July 16th at 3:00 pm
Where: MEET at Cahoon Hollow Beach next to Beachcomber Bar (parking $15). Map: http://bit.ly/oJRVke
http://www.thebeachcomber.?com/about-us/directions
1120 Cahoon Hollow Rd Wellfleet, MA 02667

AFTER PARY! BEACHCOMBER, WELLFLEET - 7PM
Where: The Beachcomber
1120 Cahoon Hollow Road, Wellfleet, MA 02667
When: Saturday, July 16, at 7:00 pm
Come enjoy great food, music, dancing, and drinks with your surf buddies!

*Gear Rental: If you don't have gear, call the Pump House Surf Shop in Orleans to reserve an SUP ($40 per day) or Surfboard ($30 per day). $5 gets you a soft, easy to set up roof rack and you’re good to go! Call ahead with a credit card to reserve gear.

Pump House Surf Shop/rentals:
http://www.pumphousesurf.c?om/services.html
9 Cranberry Highway
Orleans, MA 02653
Phone: 508-240-2226
Surfline: 508-240-2229

You can also RSVP/request RIDE SHARE on Ceto Facebook page:
https://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=144793798930633
item.name: Celebrate International Gay Surfers Day, Wellfleet, Cape Cod
